allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - ConsoFlow v1.0

ConsoFlow is a smart meter tracking application built with Next.js 16, TypeScript, and Supabase.

Features:
- Multi-meter tracking (electricity, water, gas, custom)
- Multi-location support
- Historical data import
- Interactive charts with seasonal visualization
- Consumption benchmarks and household comparisons
- Landing page with invitation code system
- Complete authentication system
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS

Tech stack:
- Next.js 16 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Supabase (PostgreSQL + Auth)
- Recharts for data visualization
- Tailwind CSS v4

Generated with Claude Code (https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
